00011         template <class From, class To>
00012         struct IsConvertible
00013         {
00014             struct Yes { char c[10]; };;
00015             typedef char No;
00016 
00017             static From MakeFrom();
00018             static No Convertor(...);
00019             static Yes Convertor(To);
00020 
00021             enum { Result = (sizeof (Convertor(MakeFrom())) == sizeof(Yes)) };
00022         };
00023 
00024         template <bool, class T1, class T2>
00025         struct Selector
00026         {
00027             typedef T1 Type;
00028         };
00029 
00030         template <class T1, class T2>
00031         struct Selector<false, T1, T2>
00032         {
00033             typedef T2 Type;
00034         };

00036         class TComparable;
00037 
00038         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00039         class TComparableBase
00040         {
00041         public:
00042             virtual ~TComparableBase(){}
00043 
00044             virtual bool Compare(const any& other) const = 0;   
00045             virtual void Assign(const any& other) = 0;
00046             virtual TComparableBase* Clone() = 0;
00047         };
00048 
00049         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00050         template<class From, class To, bool ReadOnly>
00051         class TComparableImp;
00052 
00053         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00054         template<class From, class To>
00055         class TComparableImp<From, To, true> : public TComparableBase
00056         {
00057         public:
00058             TComparableImp(const any& data) : mData(data) {}
00059 
00060             virtual bool Compare(const any& other) const
00061             {
00062                 return (*(any_cast<const To*>(other))) == (To)(any_cast<From>(mData));
00063             }
00064 
00065             virtual void Assign(const any& /*other*/) 
00066             {
00067             }
00068 
00069             virtual TComparableBase* Clone() { return new TComparableImp<From, To, true>(mData); }
00070 
00071         protected:
00072             any mData;
00073         };
00074 
00075         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00076         template<class From, class To>
00077         class TComparableImp<From, To, false> : public TComparableBase
00078         {
00079         public:
00080             TComparableImp(const any& data) : mData(data) {}
00081 
00082             virtual bool Compare(const any& other) const
00083             {
00084                 return (*(any_cast<const To*>(other))) == (To)(any_cast<From>(mData));
00085             }
00086 
00087             virtual void Assign(const any& other) 
00088             {
00089                 *const_cast<To*>(any_cast<const To*>(other)) = (To)any_cast<From>(mData);
00090             }
00091 
00092             virtual TComparableBase* Clone() { return new TComparableImp<From, To, false>(mData); }
00093 
00094         protected:
00095             any mData;
00096         };
00097 
00098         template<class P, class To, bool ReadOnly>
00099         class TComparablePolicyImp;
00100 
00101         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00102         template<class P, class To>
00103         class TComparablePolicyImp<P, To, true> : public TComparableBase
00104         {
00105         public:
00106             TComparablePolicyImp(P& policy) : mPolicy(policy) {}
00107 
00108             virtual bool Compare(const any& other) const
00109             {
00110                 return mPolicy.Compare((*(any_cast<const To*>(other))));
00111             }
00112 
00113             virtual void Assign(const any&) 
00114             {
00115             }
00116 
00117             virtual TComparableBase* Clone() { return new TComparablePolicyImp<P, To, true>(mPolicy); }
00118 
00119         protected:
00120             P mPolicy;
00121         };
00122 
00123         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00124         template<class P, class To>
00125         class TComparablePolicyImp<P, To, false> : public TComparableBase
00126         {
00127         public:
00128             TComparablePolicyImp(P& policy) : mPolicy(policy) {}
00129 
00130             virtual bool Compare(const any& other) const
00131             {
00132                 return mPolicy.Compare((*(any_cast<const To*>(other))));
00133             }
00134 
00135             virtual void Assign(const any& other) 
00136             {
00137                 mPolicy.Assign(*const_cast<To*>(any_cast<const To*>(other)));
00138             }
00139 
00140             virtual TComparableBase* Clone() { return new TComparablePolicyImp<P, To, false>(mPolicy); }
00141 
00142         protected:
00143             P mPolicy;
00144         };
00145 
00146 
00147         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00148         class TComparable
00149         {
00150         public:
00151             TComparable() : mHolder(NULL) {}
00152 
00153             bool IsEmpty()
00154             {
00155                 return mHolder == NULL;
00156             }
00157 
00158             template<class To, bool ReadOnly, class From>
00159             static TComparable MakeCompare(From value)
00160             {
00161                 TComparable compare;
00162                 compare.mHolder = new TComparableImp<From, To, ReadOnly>(value);
00163                 return compare;
00164             }
00165 
00166             template<class To, bool ReadOnly, class P >
00167             static TComparable MakeCompareByPolicy(P& policy)
00168             {
00169                 TComparable compare;
00170                 compare.mHolder = new TComparablePolicyImp<P, To, ReadOnly>(policy);
00171                 return compare;
00172             }
00173 
00174             TComparable(const TComparable& other)
00175             {
00176                 mHolder = other.mHolder ? other.mHolder->Clone() : NULL;
00177             }
00178 
00179             ~TComparable()
00180             {
00181                 delete mHolder;
00182             }
00183 
00184             TComparable& operator= (const TComparable& other)
00185             {
00186                 delete mHolder;
00187                 mHolder = other.mHolder ? other.mHolder->Clone() : NULL;
00188 
00189                 return *this;
00190             }   
00191 
00192             bool operator == (const any& other) const
00193             {
00194                 return mHolder->Compare(other);
00195             }   
00196 
00197             bool operator != (const any& other) const
00198             {
00199                 return !(*this == other);
00200             }
00201 
00202             TComparable& Assign (const any& other)
00203             {
00204                 mHolder->Assign(other);
00205 
00206                 return *this;
00207             }
00208 
00209             TComparableBase* mHolder;
00210         };
00211 
00212     }
00213 }
